segments.text: I'm going on a guided tour in the mountain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll see the world-famous magnificent waterfall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the sight and the sound.It worked on me like a magic when I was a child .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your dream will come true.It ' s really breathtaking .
segments.speaker: S2
